attributes.action: clarify detection rates for illegal drivers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Reveal who is driving illegally?

Todays technology is unfair and detrimental to the law abiding citizen, it is creating criminals and raising money by stealth.

If a car is not registered and driven eratically, speeding in London. Nothing will be done to apprehend the driver if the number plate can not be acknowledged by number plate recognition systems.

Foreign drivers buy their fuel abroad contribute nothing to the British economy, their knowledge of Britains roads is limited. They are recognised as a menace to British roads by every police force in the uk and yet the prosecution rates for these drivers are not available.

International Licenses are not treated as inferior to British Licenses because it is accepted we must be multi-cultural and respect there are differences. These differences are costing lives we should not be accepting the differences but challenging why this has not been investigated.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
